image 1920 1080
clear 180 180 255
color 255 255 255
spencil 50
line 100 100 1720 100
line 100 100 100 880
color 0 0 0
spencil 40
line 100 100 1720 100
line 100 100 100 880
color 255 255 0
spencil 1
line 100 100 1720 100
line 100 100 100 880
color 0 0 255
polygon3D 100 4 800 800 1000 800 1000 600 800 600
color 255 0 0
curve 6 300 500 550 500 550 420 610 420 610 350 510 350
save teste.ppm
